entry.title: WordPress Plugin Exploited to Steal Credit Card Data from E-commerce Sites
entry.summary: Unknown threat actors are abusing lesser-known code snippet plugins for WordPress to insert malicious PHP code in victim sites that are capable of harvesting credit card data.
